name: Hakne

personality.0: I think anyone who's nice to me is hiding evil intent.
personality.1: Change. The low are lifted up, and the high and mighty are brought down. Change is the nature of things. (Chaotic)
personality.2: I owe my survival to another urchin who taught me to live on the streets.
personality.3: I'd rather kill someone in their sleep then fight fair.
